name: MinusX
headline: AI Data Scientist for Jupyter and Metabase
description: MinusX is a chrome extension that adds a side chat to your analytics apps (Jupyter, Metabase, Grafana, Tableau, etc). Given an instruction, our agent operates your apps - by clicking & typing, just like you do - to analyze data and answer queries. We believe an AI Data Scientist is a scientist, not yet-another-new-analytics-platform. MinusX interoperates with you in tools you already love and use, and as a matter of philosophy, gets out of the way.
tags: industry:machine-learning; industry:analytics; industry:data-science; industry:ai; industry:ai-assistant; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Vivek Aithal, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder & CEO of MinusX. Spent the last 3 years as a research engineer building the world's best open-source autonomous driving agent at comma.ai. Currently building a data science agent that can sit in your browser and use all your data tools. UC Berkeley and IIT Kharagpur grad.

founders.name: Sreejith Puthanpurayil, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder & CTO of MinusX. Previous stints include Ads Delivery & Ranking at Meta, Ride-hailing backend & infra at Gojek, & full stack at Elanic, a social c2c marketplace (acquired by Share Chat)

founders.name: Arpit Saxena, Founder
founders.description: Ex-Google (Google Pay), GreyOrange Robotics, Udaan.com; Software and Systems Engineer building warehouse automation solutions for km sized warehouses

AI Data Scientist for 
  * Jupyter
![Jupyter](https://minusx.ai/_next/static/media/jupyter.0fedaa2d.svg)

A Chrome Extension that operates your analytics apps for you. MinusX is the fastest way to get insights from data.
[Add to Chrome](https://minusx.ai/</chrome-extension/>)

## Pricing
Simple, no-nonsense pricing. Pay for intelligence, 24/7 support, and early access to everything we're working on!
MonthlyAnnually
### MinusX Lite
Great if you're just exploring MinusX or like tinkering with things.
$0/month/user
[Try now!](https://minusx.ai/</chrome-extension>)
  * No credit card needed!
  * Works in Jupyter, Metabase, PostHog and Sheets
  * Up to 50 requests /week
  * Limited advanced models


### MinusX Pro
Recommended
Perfect for those who want an AI data science intern sitting in their browser 24/7.
$49/month/user
[Start Trial](https://minusx.ai/<https:/buy.stripe.com/7sIg1O1dU8apbPG7ss>)
  * Everything in Lite
  * 7 day free trial
  * Up to 1000 requests /week
  * Best-in-class models
  * 24/7 support, CEO's personal number
  * Personalization and memory
  * Early access to new app-integrations and advanced features


### MinusX Enterprise
For serious org-wide workloads with deep integrations and dedicated support.
Custom
[Contact Us](https://minusx.ai/</demo>)
  * Everything in Pro
  * Access control and audit logs
  * Org-wide sharing and collaboration
  * Dedicated support w/ Forward Deployed Engineers
  * Custom/in-house tool integrations
  * Custom models, advanced privacy features
  * Integration with Slack, Teams, etc.


## Trusted by people in some of the world’s most innovative and data intensive teams
![cult.fit](https://minusx.ai/_next/static/media/curefit.4c905ece.webp)![somos](https://minusx.ai/_next/static/media/somos.90130ebc.png)![lynxanalytics](https://minusx.ai/_next/static/media/lynxanalytics.28d10862.png)![hive.app](https://minusx.ai/_next/static/media/hive.cdb48e19.svg)
> “Really good work! I genuinely wouldn't have tried an analysis had I not had this tool. And 0 errors!”
![](https://minusx.ai/_next/static/media/apoorv.42261561.jpeg)
Apoorv Saxena
Research Scientist @ Adobe
> “MinusX has effectively replaced the need for a dedicated data analyst. I simply upload my data, and it intuitively aligns to my requirements, even accommodating minor input errors. As a regular user, I’ve found that Minus X AI has significantly streamlined my data analysis process.”
![](https://minusx.ai/_next/static/media/nishkarsh.bab55904.jpeg)
Nishkarsh Bansal
CEO @ doubtbuddy
## try minusx today!
[Add to Chrome](https://minusx.ai/</chrome-extension/>)
## FAQs
Have a different question and can’t find the answer you’re looking for?
[Join minusx Discord](https://minusx.ai/</discord/>)
### Is minusx a new platform?
    No! MinusX works in your existing analytics tools like Jupyter notebooks, Metabase, etc. Given an instruction, MinusX operates the app - by clicking and typing, just like you would - to analyze your data and answer queries.
### How is my data handled?
    We store all metadata on your browser. This includes table schemas, code, queries, and a sample of query outputs. This is used to set the context for your instruction and sent to the LLM. You can find a non legal-speak overview of the data we collect in our [_privacy policy_](https://minusx.ai/<https:/minusx.ai/privacy-simplified>)
### What can this do, over LLM chat apps?
    MinusX seamlessly integrates with existing tools. This means that you never have to get out of your workflow to answer questions. MinusX also has complete context of the app you're using, and can choose the right action for the right context.
### How much does this cost?
    The product is currently free to use. In the future, we'll charge a monthly subscription fee, and support local models/bring-your-own-keys.
### Which models do you support?
    Currently we support Claude Sonnet 3.5, GPT-4o and GPT-4o mini. We are also working on a way to let you choose your own models as well as bring your own models.
### What's the plan here?
    We want to build the best AI data scientist - one that uses whatever tool and context is needed to get the job done. We think the path to truly autonomous agents runs through useful, specialized intermediaries.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: MinusX**

**Mission:** MinusX is on a quest to redefine data analysis by embodying the role of an AI Data Scientist seamlessly integrated into the tools analysts already love, such as Jupyter and Metabase.

**Origins:** Founded in 2024 and based in San Francisco, MinusX began as a Chrome extension that adds a collaboration feature to various analytics apps, enabling users to interact with data through AI in an intuitive and familiar way. Rather than reinvent the wheel with yet another analytics platform, MinusX augments existing tools, allowing for natural language processing and data manipulation directly where users are working.

**Team:** The company currently boasts a small but efficient team of three, along with the backing of Gustaf Alstromer from Y Combinator’s Batch S24.

**Technology Focus:** MinusX operates across platforms like Jupyter, Metabase, Tableau, Grafana, and more, essentially allowing users to perform data analysis by simply instructing the AI, which mimics human interactions like clicking and typing. 

**Product Offering:**
- **Chrome Extension**: The core product allows direct interaction with data analytics applications, answering queries and generating insights by integrating AI into the user interface.
- **Pricing Plans**:
   - **MinusX Lite**: Free tier for casual users, with limited requests.
   - **MinusX Pro**: Premium plan at $49/month/user, offering more features and advanced models.
   - **MinusX Enterprise**: Customized solutions for organizations with comprehensive needs.

**User Experience**: With a focus on usability, MinusX never forces users out of their existing workflows. Instead, it provides timely assistance and insights, making it an exceptional tool for both casual users and serious analysts. 

**Feedback**: Early adopters, including research scientists and CEOs, rave about its efficiency and ability to streamline data analysis, effectively reducing the need for dedicated data analysts in some cases.

**Embracing the Future**: Looking ahead, MinusX aims to continually enhance its offerings with new integrations and functionalities, paving the way for more advanced AI-powered data manipulation.

**Explore More**: Interested users can visit their [website](https://minusx.ai) to add the Chrome extension, access documentation, or book a demo.

In a landscape inundated with analytics platforms, MinusX stands out as a collaborative partner—an AI data scientist waiting to elevate your analysis without cluttering the workspace you know and love.
